entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5 except zero across lower Richelieu.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Freezing rain across lower Richelieu in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5 except zero across lower Richelieu. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
